name: StephensQOLModPack
title: Stephen's Quality Of Life Mod Pack
author: Stephen Lujan
description:
My collection of quality of life improvements I find hard to live without. Use it alone for a vanilla-like playthrough, or with your your other favorite mods. All credit to the actual mod creators. I just curated this collection and set up in-game help.

Want to know how to use all the helpful mods? Just press [virtual-signal=signal-I] in game.
